Name: TypicalDoorOpen
Notes: A pair of opened doors that can be closed by activating SW_B.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_DEAD.Description: Can be activated when the object is killed through a cutscene action.

SW_B.Description: Makes the doors close once activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. The doors open if the 扉開く cutscene part gets executed.
